conclusion: The ball (A) starts above the cube formation on the green surface.
The ball falls and hits the top of the cone-shaped object, causing it to bounce off.
The ball, after bouncing off the cone, moves towards the right due to the angle of the collision.
The ball then collides with the cube located to the right of the initial position.
After the second collision, the ball comes to rest on top of the cube it collided with.
The ball ends up on the top of the cube to the right, as shown in the final image.
Final answer: The ball ends up on top of the cube on the right.
